fields.name: Antibiotics
fields.description: Medications that inhibit the growth of or destroy microorganisms

fields.description: Medications that relieve pain

fields.description: Medications used to treat epilepsy and seizures

fields.description: Medications used to prevent and treat malaria

fields.name: Anthelmintics
fields.description: Medications that expel parasitic worms from the body
